sentences.en: Access was via a narrow archway.
sentences.cn: 通道入口是一道狭窄的拱门。

sentences.en: Blood enters the kidneys via the renal artery.
sentences.cn: 血液通过肾动脉流进肾脏。

sentences.en: Double-stack trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.cn: 以往由卡车运送的很多货物现在都改用双层列车运送了。

sentences.en: He flew to New York via Shanghai.
I sent a message to Kitty via her sister.
sentences.cn: 我通过姬蒂的妹妹给她捎了个口信。

sentences.en: Mr Baker will return home via Britain and France.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生将取道英国和法国回国。

sentences.en: Stuart came into film-making via a circuitous route.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特费尽周折才最终开始电影制作。

sentences.en: The executive's meeting had finished and Sir Marcus had reported its conclusions to the prime minister via Richard Ryder.
sentences.cn: 领导层会议已经结束，马库斯爵士已通过理查德·赖德把会议结论报告给了首相。

sentences.en: The news reached me via my aunt.
sentences.cn: 那消息是通过我婶婶转告我的.

sentences.en: The technology to allow relief workers to contact the outside world via satellite already exists.
sentences.cn: 能够让救援人员通过卫星与外界联系的技术已经存在。

sentences.en: The ticket reads to Beijing via Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 车票上写明经上海到北京.

sentences.en: They have arrived at a solution via scientific investigation.
sentences.cn: 他们通过科学的调查研究得出了解决问题的办法.

sentences.en: Translators can now work from home, via electronic mail systems.
sentences.cn: 翻译人员现在可以利用电子邮件系统在家里工作了。

sentences.en: We drove via Lovech to the old Danube town of Ruse.
sentences.cn: 我们开车经由洛维奇到达了多瑙河畔的古镇鲁塞。
我们乘飞机经迪拜回国。

sentences.en: We flew to Athens via Paris.
sentences.cn: 我们经由巴黎飞往雅典。

sentences.en: We'll also have an election roundup from the streets of New York to the Via Veneto.
sentences.cn: 我们还有从纽约街头到威尼托大街带来的有关选举的新闻摘要。

sentences.en: You can access our homepage via the Internet.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过因特网进入我们的主页。

trans.tran_en: travelling through a place on the way to another place
